short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays USA Target Skills Scores and AMTS values on HattrickPortal Tracker pages. User must have access to player skills.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays USA Target Skills Scores and AMTS values on HattrickPortal Tracker pages. User must have access to player skills.

Players' skills are evaluated against published target skills for either the USA U21 team (prior to their 22nd birthday) or the USA NT (on or after their 22nd birthday). These scores are presented in a table on the player page in HTP.

Also reported are each player's AMTS scores which are essentially modified HTMS values utilizing only the skills relevant to the outfield position being analyzed. Additionally, users with U21 and NT scout access within HTP will see these AMTS values on player search and player list tables that display the required skills.
